markdownRemark.html:
It’s no secret that I’m a complete sucker for Tungsten1. It might very well may be one of my favorite typeface ever made. It’s nice to see Hoefler & Co2 add new styles to their iconic typefaces. Hopefully a non-condensed version of Tungsten is coming next.

  1. I’ve been using Tungsten Semi-Bold in my logo for years now. Still looks as good.

    ↩

  2. Still not getting used to it.

    ↩
